column2: "Ah, Leader, perfect timing. Help me explore the Desert. Do we have enough manpower for an exploration mission?"
"We'll help too! I mean, we're a team, so you should call us before you go."
"It's too dangerous for you two. Make some rice for us when we get back. You're good at that."
"I'm glad you liked our rice, but we can fight too. I don't want you looking down on us!"
"Hmm... Is that so? As your captain, it's my duty to know my team's capabilities. Alright, let's go as a group of four this time."
